title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks Paint Tube Pen
description:
Paint tube pen developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

It may look like a tube of paint, but when the top is taken off it reveals a pen tip.  Comfortable grip for writing.  Has a small image of Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942, on the tube’s wrap.

  • Dimensions: 4.33 x 1.25 x .86 in.
  • Ink Color: Black Ink
